attributes.action: stop inconsistencies, deliberate or accidental untruths by social workers
attributes.additional_details: I wish to petition  that all interviews etc be recorded to protect those under scrutiny and social workers of all grades within a office, home or on the telephone  I wish to help other parents and disabled parents going through the same in the future to not have to go through the same as I have.
attributes.background: From personal experience I have  endured social services I am a disabled parent going through tough times. I've had a initial child protection conference where it be came clear that there were lots of discrepancies, misunderstandings and in my view lies
